text: Biscarrosse - Parentis Airport (ICAO code: LFBS) is located at Parentis-en- Born in Landes departement of Nouvelle-Aquitaine region at 3.5 km south-east of Biscarosse. A campus of the École nationale de l'aviation civile (French civil aviation university) is located on the aerodrome.Biscarrosse == References == Category:Airports in France Category:Landes
title: Biscarrosse – Parentis Airport
